courses.title: Raga Composition Generator
courses.description: Create authentic ragas with our AI-powered composition tool that respects traditional Indian classical music structures and scales based on your text prompts or hummed melodies.

courses.title: Taal Pattern Explorer
courses.description: Explore and generate complex rhythmic patterns based on traditional Indian taals like Teentaal, Ektaal, and Jhaptaal with customizable tempo and variations from your text descriptions.

courses.title: Carnatic Melody Generator
courses.description: Generate authentic Carnatic music melodies with our specialized tool that understands the nuances of South Indian classical music traditions from simple text prompts.

courses.title: Tabla Accompaniment AI
courses.description: Create realistic tabla accompaniments for your compositions with our AI that adapts to your melody and understands traditional playing techniques.

courses.title: Classical Fusion Composer
courses.description: Blend Indian classical elements with contemporary sounds using our fusion composer tool that maintains the authenticity of traditional ragas while exploring modern arrangements.

courses.title: Instrument Mixer
courses.description: Mix and match traditional Indian instruments like sitar, sarod, tabla, veena, and more with modern instruments to create unique musical textures from your preferences.

courses.title: Voice to Raga Converter
courses.description: Hum or sing a melody and our AI will transform it into a fully orchestrated raga with appropriate accompaniment and ornamentation.

courses.title: Alap Generator
courses.description: Generate meditative alap sections that gradually introduce your chosen raga with the proper mood and ornamentation based on your text descriptions.

courses.title: Tanpura Drone Customizer
courses.description: Create customized tanpura drone tracks with adjustable tuning, tone, and resonance to provide the perfect background for your raga practice or compositions.

courses.title: Gharana Style Adaptor
courses.description: Transform your compositions to reflect different gharanas (stylistic schools) of Hindustani classical music with characteristic ornamentations and phrasings.

courses.title: Lyrics to Dhrupad Generator
courses.description: Input your lyrics and generate a traditional Dhrupad composition with appropriate raga and taal settings that respect this ancient vocal style.

courses.title: Multi-Instrument Orchestrator
courses.description: Automatically arrange your melody for a full ensemble of Indian classical instruments with appropriate roles and interactions between instruments.

courses.title: Mood-Based Raga Selector
courses.description: Describe your mood or the emotion you want to convey, and our AI will suggest and generate music in the most appropriate raga for that sentiment.

courses.title: Time Cycle Variation Generator
courses.description: Create complex time cycle variations and polyrhythms based on traditional Indian taal structures with our advanced rhythm generation tool.

courses.title: Jugalbandi Simulator
courses.description: Simulate a musical dialogue between two instruments of your choice, creating an authentic jugalbandi experience with AI-generated call and response patterns.
